Supreme

Lonely Peaks

420 SEK

Description

This is a cap with a patch made from scratch. The patch says "Dont Leave Me Alone" with the backdrop of mountains. The "dont" is stitched in the same colour as the background so all you see is "Leave Me Alone". This hat was created to raise money for people with mental health issues and suicide prevention. Its a symbol of when people seem like they dont want your help but when you look closer, they are asking for all your help.
